spec.expr: sum(istio_requests_total{reporter=~"$qrep", destination_service=~"$service", source_workload_namespace=~"$srcns"}) by (source_workload) or sum(istio_tcp_sent_bytes_total{reporter=~"$qrep", destination_service=~"$service", source_workload_namespace=~"$srcns"}) by (source_workload)

sum(istio_requests_total{reporter="destination", destination_service=~"$service", destination_cluster=~"$dstcluster", destination_workload_namespace=~"$dstns"}) by (destination_workload) or sum(istio_tcp_sent_bytes_total{reporter="destination", destination_service=~"$service", destination_cluster=~"$dstcluster", destination_workload_namespace=~"$dstns"}) by (destination_workload)

spec.query:
round(
  sum(irate(istio_requests_total{destination_service=~"$service",reporter=~"$qrep"}[5m])),
  0.001
)

sum(
    irate(
      istio_requests_total{destination_service=~"$service",reporter=~"$qrep",response_code!~"5.*"}[5m]
    )
  )
/
    sum(irate(istio_requests_total{destination_service=~"$service",reporter=~"$qrep"}[5m]))
  or on ()
    vector(1)

histogram_quantile(
      0.5,
      sum by (le) (
        irate(
          istio_request_duration_milliseconds_bucket{destination_service=~"$service",reporter=~"$qrep"}[1m]
        )
      )
    )
  /
    1000
or
  histogram_quantile(
    0.5,
    sum by (le) (
      irate(istio_request_duration_seconds_bucket{destination_service=~"$service",reporter=~"$qrep"}[1m])
    )
  )

histogram_quantile(
      0.9,
      sum by (le) (
        irate(
          istio_request_duration_milliseconds_bucket{destination_service=~"$service",reporter=~"$qrep"}[1m]
        )
      )
    )
  /
    1000
or
  histogram_quantile(
    0.9,
    sum by (le) (
      irate(istio_request_duration_seconds_bucket{destination_service=~"$service",reporter=~"$qrep"}[1m])
    )
  )

histogram_quantile(
      0.99,
      sum by (le) (
        irate(
          istio_request_duration_milliseconds_bucket{destination_service=~"$service",reporter=~"$qrep"}[1m]
        )
      )
    )
  /
    1000
or
  histogram_quantile(
    0.99,
    sum by (le) (
      irate(istio_request_duration_seconds_bucket{destination_service=~"$service",reporter=~"$qrep"}[1m])
    )
  )
sum(irate(istio_tcp_received_bytes_total{destination_service=~"$service",reporter=~"$qrep"}[1m]))

round(
  sum(irate(istio_requests_total{destination_service=~"$service",reporter="destination"}[5m])),
  0.001
)

sum(
    irate(
      istio_requests_total{destination_service=~"$service",reporter="destination",response_code!="5.*"}[5m]
    )
  )
/
    sum(irate(istio_requests_total{destination_service=~"$service",reporter="destination"}[5m]))
  or on ()
    vector(1)
sum(irate(istio_tcp_sent_bytes_total{destination_service=~"$service",reporter=~"$qrep"}[1m]))
